title: [Ta'Illistim, Aaendarein Var]
description: Meandering along towards the edges of the cliffs, the var continues to skirt the bottom of the belltower.  Deep green ivy encases the bottom section of the tower in a living green carpet, as the upper portion of the grey stone belltower soars overhead.

Meandering along towards the edges of the cliffs, the var continues to skirt the bottom of the bell tower.  Deep green ivy encases the bottom section of the tower in a living green carpet, as the upper portion of the silvery blue stone bell tower soars overhead.  A silvery blue stone building and a small shop are tucked back to either side of the spire.
